name: Keep Them Alive (I am Shen)
description:
My compo entry made in 48 hours for the Ludumdare 46, with the theme Keep It Alive

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/keep-them-alive

I'm  glad I was finally able to participate in my second compo!

If you happen to find any bugs or have any kind of problems, feel free to post a comment!

Thank you for playing!

Twitter: @Shen_dev
